gov.va.vinci.leo.listener

Class BaseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaAsBaseCallbackListener
      • gov.va.vinci.leo.listener.BaseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaASStatusCallbackListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCsvListener, BaseDatabaseListener, SimpleXmiListener

    public abstract class BaseListener
extends org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaAsBaseCallbackListener
    BaseListener class that other listeners can extend from to add default functionality commonly used.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String[] annotationTypeFilter
      the annotation types to filter on.
      protected CSI docInfo
      CSI annotation for the document being processed in an entityProcessComplete event.
      protected boolean exitOnError
      Flag to indicate whether or not entityProcessComplete processing should terminate when exceptions are received from the service.
      protected String[] inputType
      The list of input types to save to the database.
      protected String lastException
      Exceptions Received from service via entityProcessComplete event.
      protected org.apache.log4j.Logger LOG
      Logging object of output.
      protected File mOutputDir
      Output Directory for this gov.va.vinci.leo.listener output if required.
      protected int numReceived
      Number of CAS objects returned from the pipeline.
      protected int numSent
      Number of CAS objects sent to the service for processing.
      protected String previousReferenceId
      Use to work around a bug in 2.4.2 where UIMA calls the onBeforeMessageSend one extra time on the last document.
      protected String referenceID
      ID of the document received in an entityProcessComplete event.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseListener(boolean isExitOnError, String... filter)
      Constructor that allows user to specify whether or not the entityProcessComplete method should exit when an error is received.
      BaseListener(File aOutputDir, boolean isExitOnError, String... filter)
      Set the output directory and whether or not the entityProcessComplete method should exit when an error is received.
      BaseListener(String... filter)
      Default Constructor, defaults the exitOnError flag to false.

    • Field Detail

      • inputType

        protected String[] inputType
        The list of input types to save to the database. If set, only documents with annotations of a type in the list, those annotations, and their related feature are saved.

      • mOutputDir

        protected File mOutputDir
        Output Directory for this gov.va.vinci.leo.listener output if required.

      • numReceived

        protected int numReceived
        Number of CAS objects returned from the pipeline.

      • numSent

        protected int numSent
        Number of CAS objects sent to the service for processing.

      • exitOnError

        protected boolean exitOnError
        Flag to indicate whether or not entityProcessComplete processing should terminate when exceptions are received from the service.

      • lastException

        protected String lastException
        Exceptions Received from service via entityProcessComplete event.

      • referenceID

        protected String referenceID
        ID of the document received in an entityProcessComplete event.

      • docInfo

        protected CSI docInfo
        CSI annotation for the document being processed in an entityProcessComplete event.

      • LOG

        protected org.apache.log4j.Logger LOG
        Logging object of output.

      • annotationTypeFilter

        protected String[] annotationTypeFilter
        the annotation types to filter on. If annotation types are included, sub-classes can call hasFilteredAnnotation on this class to determine if the cas has one or more of the filter annotation types. Type is the string name, ie: gov.va.vinci.uima.type.Token

      • previousReferenceId

        protected String previousReferenceId
        Use to work around a bug in 2.4.2 where UIMA calls the onBeforeMessageSend one extra time on the last document. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-3581?jql=project%20%3D%20UIMA%20AND%20resolution%20%3D%20Unresolved%20AND%20assignee%20%3D%20cwiklik%20ORDER%20BY%20priority%20DESC

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseListener

        public BaseListener(String... filter)
        Default Constructor, defaults the exitOnError flag to false.
        Parameters:
        filter - the annotation types to filter on. If annotation types are included, sub classes can call hasFilteredAnnotation on this class to determine if the cas has one or more of the filter annotation types.

      • BaseListener

        public BaseListener(boolean isExitOnError,
            String... filter)
        Constructor that allows user to specify whether or not the entityProcessComplete method should exit when an error is received.
        Parameters:
        isExitOnError - If true then exit when an error is received from the CAS process complete event
        filter - the annotation types to filter on. If annotation types are included, sub classes can call hasFilteredAnnotation on this class to determine if the cas has one or more of the filter annotation types.

      • BaseListener

        public BaseListener(File aOutputDir,
            boolean isExitOnError,
            String... filter)
        Set the output directory and whether or not the entityProcessComplete method should exit when an error is received.
        Parameters:
        aOutputDir - Path to the output directory. This must be a directory.
        isExitOnError - True if the entityProcessComplete event should exit when an error is received
        filter - the annotation types to filter on. If annotation types are included, sub classes can call hasFilteredAnnotation on this class to determine if the cas has one or more of the filter annotation types.

      • entityProcessComplete

        public void entityProcessComplete(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS aCas,
                         org.apache.uima.collection.EntityProcessStatus aStatus)
        Specified by:
        entityProcessComplete in interface org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaASStatusCallbackListener
        Overrides:
        entityProcessComplete in class org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaAsBaseCallbackListener
        Parameters:
        aCas - the CAS containing the processed entity and the analysis results
        aStatus - the status of the processing. This object contains a record of any Exception that occurred, as well as timing information.
        See Also:

      • getNumSent

        public int getNumSent()
        The number of CAS objects sent to the service.
        Returns:
        number of CAS objects sent up to the service

      • getNumReceived

        public int getNumReceived()
        Return the number of CAS objects that were returned by the service.
        Returns:
        number of CAS objects received from the service

      • isExitOnError

        public boolean isExitOnError()
        If true then the listener will exit the entityProcessComplete event when an error occurs.
        Returns:
        true if the listener should exit when errors occur.

      • setExitOnError

        public void setExitOnError(boolean exitOnError)
        Set the flag that if true will cause the entityProcessComplete method to return when an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        exitOnError - value to set.

      • entityProcessError

        public boolean entityProcessError()
        Return true if an exception was received from the service when the entityProcessComplete event was thrown.
        Returns:
        True if an exception was received, false otherwise

      • getReferenceLocation

        protected String getReferenceLocation(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jcas)
        Return the document ID based on the CSI or SourceDocumentInformation objects.
        Parameters:
        jcas - JCas object where the annotations are stored
        Returns:
        String object containing the document ID or null if no ID is found

      • hasFilteredAnnotation

        public boolean hasFilteredAnnotation(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS aCas)
        See if the CAS has ANY annotations of the types specified in annotationTypeFilter.
        Parameters:
        aCas - the CAS to check
        Returns:
        true if the CAS has ANY of the types, false if it does not

      • checkForError

        protected boolean checkForError(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS aCas,
                    org.apache.uima.collection.EntityProcessStatus aStatus)
        Check for an error in the return status of the processed CAS. Return true if there is an error.
        Parameters:
        aCas - CAS that was processed
        aStatus - Status object that contains the exception if one is thrown
        Returns:
        True if an error was returned, False otherwise

      • getAnnotationTypeFilter

        public String[] getAnnotationTypeFilter()
        gets the list of annotation types to be filtered on. A CAS can be checked via hasFilteredAnnotation(CAS aCas) against this list.
        Returns:
        the list of annotation types to be filtered on. A CAS can be checked via hasFilteredAnnotation(CAS aCas) against this list.

      • setAnnotationTypeFilter

        public void setAnnotationTypeFilter(String[] annotationTypeFilter)
        Sets a list of annotation types. Type is the string name, ie: gov.va.vinci.uima.type.Token
        Parameters:
        annotationTypeFilter - a list of annotation types. Type is the string name, ie: gov.va.vinci.uima.type.Token

      • hasAnnotationsToProcess

        protected boolean hasAnnotationsToProcess(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS aCas)
        See if the cas has any annotations of the input type (if input types are specified).
        Parameters:
        aCas - the CAS to check
        Returns:
        true if the CAS has any annotations of type in inputType, or true if no inputTypes are specified.
